manifest.notes: Canonical integration/addon manifest for SEO/AEO fail-closed generation and claim safety.

shipped.label: CST scope hash and optional policy hash pinning
OpenRouter via fal routed through clawproxy

wpc.notes: Work Policy Contracts enforced via clawcontrols.

proof_bundles.notes: Proof bundle verification in production path.

transparency_log_inclusion_proofs.notes: Transparency log inclusion proofs are planned.

integrations.name: Microsoft Graph

approval_requirements.notes: Write/admin paths require fail-closed approvals and replay-safe controls.

allowed: Microsoft Graph can be connected via official API with enterprise buildout controls.
Write and admin actions require WPC approval gates, scoped tokens, and explicit least-privilege auth scopes.
Model-assisted runs can produce gateway receipts and proof bundles for audit and replay checks.
must_not_imply: Do not imply this integration is available now as a native connector.
Do not claim out-of-the-box or fully shipped support before release gates pass.

integrations.notes: Microsoft Graph mapped from taxonomy mode=api-only.
